law.text: A partner or other person named as a partner in a filed statement of partnership authority or in a list maintained by an agent pursuant to KRS 362.1-303(2) may file a statement of denial stating the name of the partnership, the date of filing of the statement of partnership authority, and the fact that is being denied, which may include denial of a person's authority or status as a partner. A statement of denial is a limitation on authority as provided in KRS 362.1-303(4) and (5).
law.history: Created 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 31, effective July 12, 2006.
